kassandr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Add linear and root trends to tibble

add_trend.Rd

Add linear and root trends to tibble

add_trend(original)

Arguments

original

tibble

Value

tibble with trend_lin and trend_root columns

Details

Add linear and root trends to tibble

Examples

# dumb example: add trend to cross section :) :)
add_trend(cars)
#>    speed dist trend_lin trend_root
#> 1      4    2         1   1.000000
#> 2      4   10         2   1.414214
